entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:03 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog at times. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:03 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:03 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
